title: Electoral, party system change in Russia, Mexico

content.question:
Describe Russia’s electoral system before the 2007 Duma elections. Explain how the electoral system shaped the pre-2007 Russian party system. 

Describe a specific change to the Russian electoral system that was designed for the 2007 Duma elections and explain its impact on party competition. 

Describe Mexico’s current electoral system. 

Describe one electoral reform made in Mexico in the 1990s and explain how that reform affected Mexico’s party system.
